snippet: The top Communist Party official in Lhasa, the Tibetan capital, has urged security personnel to step up surveillance of monasteries.
abstract: Top Communist Party official in Tibetan capital of Lhasa urges security personnel to step up surveillance of monasteries and along key roads in preparation for a period of heightened social turbulence; comments come amid increasing tension and violence in ethnically Tibetan parts of China.
lead_paragraph: The top Communist Party official in Lhasa, the Tibetan capital, has urged security personnel to step up surveillance of monasteries.

headline.seo: In Tibet, Communist Official Orders Increased Security
headline.main: Communist Official in Tibet Orders Increased Security
headline.print_headline: China: Official in Tibet Orders More Security
